text: Kintu yakhana tadera kache bhalo abastha asato, tara balato -- ''e-saba amadera jan'ya.’’ Ara yakhana manda abastha tadera upare ghatato tara aropa karato musara o tamra sange yara chila tadera upare. Eki naya ye nihsandeha tadera kriyakalapa allah‌ra kache rayeche? Kintu tadera adhikansa'i jane na.
